maqras.text: Iyo mirwi uko ari ibiri uko imeze nink’umuntu afise ubuhumyi hamwe n’uwutumva, n’umuntu abona hamwe n’uwumva mbega abo bantu uko ari babiri barashobora kungana, mbega mwebwe ntimwiyumvira
Natwe twajanye intumwa y’Imana Nuhu (iii) kubantu biwe nukubabwira duti:- jewe kuri mwebwe ndi mubatuza basigura ibintu vyose
Yuko mutosenga uwariwe wese atari Imana yonyene gusa, mu vy’ukuri jewe ndabafitiye ubwoba bw’ibihano vy’umusi ubabaza cane

Aho naho niho bavuze b’abategetsi babamwe bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri bo mubwoko bwabo bati:- twebwe ntitukubona neza atari uko uri umuntu nkatwe, kandi ntitukubona atari uko abagukurikiye ari bamwe baboneka neza yuko batishoboye kuri twebwe no kuvyo twiyumvira ubwambere gusa, kandi ntitubabona yuko mufise ikintu kirenze hejuru yacu, ahubwo tubabona yuko mwebwe muri ababeshi

Yavuze ati:- bantu banje! mubona gute nkiyo noba mfise ibimenyetso biri k’umugaragaro bivuye k’Umuremyi wanje, nukumpa imigisha ivuye kuriyo hanyuma ikayinyegerezako, mbega twobategeka kuyemera namwe muyanka

Namwe bantu banje! Jewe sindabasaba amaronko kubera ibi vyose, kandi ntampembo yanje mfise atari ku Mana yanje, nanje sinzobirukana abemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri, kuko bazohura n’Umuremyi wabo, mugabo jewe ndababona yuko mwebwe muri mubantu bafise ubujuju
Namwe bantu banje! ni nde azomfasha imbere y’Imana ninabirukana, mbega mwebwe ntimwiyumvira

Kandi sindababwira yuko mfise ububiko bw’Imana canke mfise ubumenyi bw’ibintu bitazwi, kandi simvuga yuko jewe ndi Umumarayika, kandi simvuga kuri bamwe bankengera amaso yanyu yuko Imana itazobaha imigisha yayo, Imana niyo ifise ubumenyi bw’ibiri mumishaha yabo, aha rero ntankeka nzoba ndimu bantu bahemukiye imitima yabo
Bavuze bati:- ewe ntumwa y’Imana Nuhu (iii) warahaririye natwe kandi urarenza urugero kubihari biri hagati yacu na wewe, rero nutuzanire ivyo watwemereye niwaba uri mubantu bavugisha ukuri
Nawe abishura ati:- Imana izobazanira ibishatse, namwe ntimuzo shobora kuyinanira
Kandi impanuro zanje ntaco zizobamarira naho nobahanura, Imana ibishatse yuko muzimira, niwe Muremyi wanyu kandi niwe niho muzosubizwa yo
Ni vy’ukuri, baravuga bamwe batemera Imana y’ukuri yuko ariwe yiyandikiye iyi Qur’ani ntagatifu, wewe vuga uti:- ninaba ari jewe nayiyandikiye intahe ibe kuri jewe, nanje ndi kure y’intahe yanyu
Yareretswe intumwa y’Imana Nuhu (iii) yuko atazo kwemera uwariwe wese mu bantu bawe atari babandi bamaze kwemera, kuri ivyo rero ntuterwe n’agahinda kuvyo bahora bagira
Nubaze ubwato imbere y’amaso yacu nokumategeko yacu, kandi ntumvugishe kuri bamwe bahemukira imitima yabo, mu vy’ukuri abo bantu bazo kwibizwa mumazi
Aguma abaza bwabwato, uko bamucako b’abategetsi b’abahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri bomuri ico gihe ciwe baguma bamutwenga nawe avuga ati:- nimwaba mwebwe mudutwenga, natwe tuzobatwenga nkuko mudutwenga
Ubu vuba muzomenya uwuzoshikirwa n’ibihano bizomutetereza nuwo ibihano bizomugumako mubuzima bwiwe bwose

N’igihe hashika itegeko ryacu, n’Isi itangura gusesagura amazi yayo twaciye tumubwira duti:- nushire muri ubwo bwato ibintu bibiri bibiri hamwe n’abantu bomurugo rwawe dukuyemwo bamwe itegeko ry’Imana ryarenganye kuribo, hanyuma utware abantu bose bakwemeye, rero abantu batamwemeye hamwe nawe nibakeyi cane
